sourcesContent:
<template>
<main>
  <router-view/>
</main>
 
</template>

<script>
//import { logİn } from "./view/login/login";
import home from "./components/homes/home.vue"

import { auth } from "./components/firebaseconf";
import {  signInWithEmailAndPassword} from "firebase/auth";
export default {

  data(){
    return {
      vmodelname:"",
      vmodelpassw:""
    }
  },
  components:{home},
  methods:{
    loginBtn(name,passw){
    
      this.logİn(name,passw)
         .then((sonuc)=>{
          console.log(sonuc);this.$router.push("/home");
          //if(sonuc){}
         })
         .catch((hata)=>{
            this.bildirimGoster(hata.code+" mesaj")
         })
    },
    
    async logİn( email, password) {
          const a =await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password)
        /*kullanıcıya ait bilgiler içinde */
        if(a){console.log(a.user.accessToken);this.$router.push("/home");}
          return a
    
    },
    bildirimGoster(msj){alert(msj)},
    inputcontrol(name,passw){
      if(name !== "" && passw !==""){this.loginBtn(name,passw)}
      else{this.bildirimGoster("Tüm alanları doldurunuz")}
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style>
@import './assets/bootstrap.css' 
;

</style>
